name: Blueprints (itch)
description:
As you observe those walking down there, you imagine what could their lives be. 

By using your mental blueprint, you can change some elements of what you see by using scissors to cut and displace them and looking at objects.

By using your mental blueprint, you can change some elements of what you see by using scissors to cut and displace them and looking at objects.

Press backspace if you want to skip the intro.

Let me know if you encounter wild typos or game breaking bugs during your game session.

An #advjam2020 game made in 7 days. I scrapped my first game during the first half of the jam.

Blueprints is based on my other work: https://guimero64.itch.io/hyperlinks (only in french)
